page.syntax: New_Array as P = <ARRAY>.APPEND_ARRAYS( Array1 as P, Array2 as P [, ArrayN as P ] )

argument.name: New_Array
argument.description: The new array produced by appending Array2 to Array1.

argument.name: ArrayN
argument.description: Optional. as many additional arrays as Desired.

page.description: The <ARRAY>.APPEND_ARRAYS() method appends Array2 to Array1 to produce New_Array. Both Array1 and Array2 must have one dimension and have the same structure.
page.example: dim cars[10] as P cars.initialize_properties("manufacturer|model",<<%str% Ford|Taurus Ford|Focus GM|Malibu Dodge|Stratus %str%) dim trucks[10] as P trucks.initialize_properties("manufacturer|model",<<%str% Ford|F-150 Ford|Ranger Dodge|Dakota %str%) dim vehicles[2] as P vehicles.append_arrays(cars,trucks) values = vehicles.dump_properties("manufacturer model") ui_dlg_box("show_array",<<%dlg% [.50,10index^||values] %dlg%)
